thread.title: Scott Rhoton
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Scott Rhoton

author: Scott Rhoton
title: Scott Rhoton
text:
I was looking for a replacement 3-way brass rotary switch for a three lamp tension pole lamp gifted to my Mom by Dad many years ago that Mom had given to me.
I sent an email listing the nomenclature printed on the back of the switch to include voltages and numbered wire leads to Antique Lamp Supply and received a reply from Stephanie the following day that included confirmation that the switch I was looking at on their website should wire the same way and she additionally provided a wiring diagram to assist me.
I placed an order for two of the switches that day, received them in good condition five days later, and successfully installed one of them in the lamp that is now functioning perfectly! Thank you!!
I also signed up for their email how-to list and have already received my first email concerning very detailed touch control switch replacement for table top lamps.
